attributes.action: To make all Council Tax Bands accurate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we need to have a fair coucil tax banding system as too many people are paying more money per month than their neighbours for the exact same property and all valuation boards say is we have looked at the band and we think it is correct, it is no good enough thinking it is correct because as by law council tax bands have to be correct and far to many people are paying more for the same property while the public are getting ripped off by councils who change the rules to suit themselves when things don't go in their favour
